> All :

quisite, which is
> designed to handle the problem that you only want to ru=
n some tests
> when some prerequisites are satisfied(E. g. you want to run =
the test
> only on the linux platform, etc.)
>
> the test will be like this=
.
>
> @RunWith(Prerequisi teAwareClassRunn er.class)
> public class TestCas=
esOnDifferen tOS {
>
> @Test
> @Prerequisite( checker =3D OSChecker.class, =
arguments =3D OSChecker.MAC)
> public void shouldRunOnMac( ) throws Excepti=
on {
>
> }
> }
>
> anyone who needs customized Checker can easily write the=
ir own by
> implementing the Check interface.
>
